channel.title: GitHub Nix Monthly Trending
channel.description: Monthly Trending of Nix in GitHub

item.title: NixOS/nixos-hardware
item.description: A collection of NixOS modules covering hardware quirks.

item.title: NotAShelf/nvf
item.description: Modular, extensible and distro-agnostic Neovim configuration framework for Nix/NixOS

item.title: Mic92/sops-nix
item.description: Atomic secret provisioning for NixOS based on sops

item.title: 0xc000022070/zen-browser-flake
item.description: Community-driven Nix Flake for the Zen browser

item.title: k3d3/claude-desktop-linux-flake
item.description: Nix Flake for Claude Desktop on Linux

item.title: NixOS/nix.dev
item.description: Official documentation for getting things done with Nix.

item.title: anotherhadi/nixy
item.description: Nixy simplifies and unifies the Hyprland ecosystem with a modular, easily customizable setup. It provides a structured way to manage your system configuration and dotfiles with minimal effort.

item.title: nix-community/disko
item.description: Declarative disk partitioning and formatting using nix [maintainers=Lassulus Enzime iFreilicht Mic92 phaer]

item.title: dustinlyons/nixos-config
item.description: General purpose Nix configuration for macOS / NixOS (with starter templates!)

item.title: nix-community/stylix
item.description: Theming framework for NixOS, Home Manager, nix-darwin, and Nix-on-Droid [maintainers=@awwpotato, @danth, @trueNAHO]
